entry.title: The Tale of Baby Issac
entry.summary:
Author: Becky_Boo

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,177Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 11

Summary: When Derek and Stiles leave the McCall Pack to create their own Pack, Isaac feels adrift, but he stays because of his loyalty to Scott. However, as time goes by, Isaac feels more alone in Scott's Pack.  Isaac's decision to leave leads him to the Hale Pack's front door.  Will Stiles and Derek accept Isaac into their Pack? How will the rest of the Hales react to Isaac?

entry.title: The Phase That Pays
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,957Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: After the nogitsune, Stiles learned how to disappear quietly.In oversized clothes, empty laughter, and meals that end in cold porcelain, he unravels slowly—in corners no one looks at,in details no one knows how to name.The pack sees him.They just don’t know how to help.But Derek does.With glances that linger too long, with silences that speak louder than words,he starts picking up the pieces before Stiles even realizes he's breaking.This is a story about someone who’s forgotten how to exist—and someone who chooses to stay anyway.

entry.title: An American Werewolf in Notting Hill
entry.summary:
Author: anenglishwolf

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,057Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 65

Summary: Derek Hale may just be the biggest film-star in the world. In Stiles' humble opinion, he's certainly the hottest. And Stiles knows from hot film-stars - after all, he works in William Thacker's travel bookshop, while doing the exchange student thing in London, England. Yeah, that William Thacker - former resident of Notting Hill, now married to superstar Anna Scott. Who is rumoured to be making a werewolf film in the UK with - guess who - Derek Hale...Is Stiles going to get to meet the crush of his life?

entry.summary:
Author: NiklausScratchIII

Will their vastly different needs find a way to align, or is a neighbor wolf just a neighbor wolf at the end of the day.orDerek is drowning in single parent fatherhood. Stiles loves babies. entry.title: I desire violently, and I wait
entry.summary:
Author: shona22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,185Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 137

Summary: “Because, Stiles.” He hesitated, testing the words on his tongue before finally speaking. “You’re a child. You don’t know what you want.”That particular ugly expression – of something hurt, wounded– flashes across the boy's features again. “And you chose this child, so–”“Give me a break,” Derek snapped, standing abruptly. “You think I chose this? You think I had a say in what my wolf did? You think I would ever choose a child? Choose you?”__Derek carried a secret—his wolf had claimed Stiles long ago, a truth hidden in the ravines of his sick mind. He refused to act on that wild instinct—wouldn't, couldn't. Now, that carefully guarded choice has begun to unravel, bleeding into sharp words and bruising touches—too much, yet never enough. He wonders if he has always been the very monster the hunters whispered about.

entry.title: Last time I saw him... was definitely the time I saw him last
entry.summary:
Author: fischl_irl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,249Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Summary: It’s something he tries not to think about.Like most of the traumatic events in his life, it’s buried deep in the back of his mind. He only brings it out to pick at it anxiously in the dead of the night, unable to sleep out of the overwhelming fear that something might happen to his father while he’s unconscious. In the middle of the night, the moon hanging high in his bedroom window, he picks. Thinks about her. Thinks about the life he could’ve had if it weren’t for his poor mother losing her mind. Thinks about how the disease is hereditary. Thinks about how long it’d take for him to succumb, to end up like her.But there’s one part about the whole ordeal that he doesn’t dare think about. A part that he feels if he so much as ponders, his father will wail. He tells himself he made it up, that it didn’t really happen. He tells himself over and over again.Stiles Stilinski never had a brother.-----a teen wolf x maze runner crossover fic in which stiles and thomas are long-lost twin brothers.

entry.title: call it off
entry.summary:
Author: endversed

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,401Chapters: 3/11Kudos: 311

Summary: “You kissed me,” Stiles says. To that, Derek says nothing. His gaze does not leave Stiles’ mouth. “But you… you’re straight,” Stiles carries on. And still, Derek says nothing. His fingers twitch harshly around his grip on thin air. “You have a girlfriend,” Stiles whispers. Derek is on his feet in an instant.  Stiles is the gay, terminally-single loser of Beacon Hills High. Derek is the straight, cheerleader-dating jock he should have been smart enough to stay away from.
